response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional quality and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $15,000. However, to facilitate a transaction that benefits both parties, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $20,000. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and personalized support to ensure seamless integration into your workflow. Please let me know if this proposal aligns with your expectations and budget.", "product_price": 20000}
